snippet: President Dmitri A. Medvedev ordered Russia’s prosecutor general on Monday to verify the legality of the conviction of Mikhail B. Khodorkovsky.
abstract: Russian Pres Dmitri A Medvedev orders Russia's prosecutor general to verify the legality of the conviction of Mikhail B Khodorkovsky, former billionaire whose imprisonment has been widely condemned as politically motivated; move comes a day after an election that returns Prime Min Vladimir V Putin to the presidency.
lead_paragraph: President Dmitri A. Medvedev ordered Russia’s prosecutor general on Monday to verify the legality of the conviction of Mikhail B. Khodorkovsky.

headline.seo: Russia Orders Review of Khodorkovsky Conviction
headline.main: Russian Leader Orders Review of Oil Tycoon’s Conviction
headline.print_headline: Russian Leader Orders Review Of Oil Tycoon’s Conviction
